value.title: #1 DAX Fridays! 101: The basics of the DAX Language
value.excerpt: In today's video I want to go through the basics of DAX and explain basic pitfalls that you will fall into if you come from excel or are a business user. #daxfridays #dax #curbal   Have a great Friday! value.title: #2 DAX Fridays! 101: Introduction to filter and row context
value.excerpt: Are you new to DAX and want to learn what those things called filter context and row context are? I will attempt to do just that in today's video. Let me know how I did in the comments :) #dax #powerbi #daxfridays #curbal  Happy friday! value.title: #5 DAX Fridays! 101: Order of evaluation for DAX formulas
value.excerpt: It is time to get cracking again with some DAX 101, this time we will talk about in what order DAX executes its functions. Happy Friday! value.excerpt: Why do you get errors when you use some DAX functions as a measure or table or calculated column?
